social-media-lab.title: Cornell Social Media lab
social-media-lab.description: Members of the Cornell Social Media Lab are interested in social behavior and technology, the impact of communication technology on well-being, and developing interventions that encourage prosocial behaviors.

social-technology-lab.title: Social Technology lab
social-technology-lab.description: The Social Technologies Lab at Cornell Tech designs, builds, and studies social systems focusing on topics related to Technology, Media and Democracy.

digital-life-initiative.title: Digital Life Initiative
digital-life-initiative.description: Digital Life Initiative explores societal perspectives surrounding the development and application of digital technology, focusing on ethics, policy, politics, and quality of life.

machine-learning-at-cornell.title: Machine Learning at Cornell
machine-learning-at-cornell.description: Machine Learning at Cornell is a interdisciplinary learning and research group made up of over 30 Cornell University faculty and hundreds of involved students and alumni.

future-of-learning-lab.title: Cornell Future of Learning lab
future-of-learning-lab.description: The Future of Learning Lab is committed to advancing our understanding of the impact of technology in education and how it can be an engine of equality in society.

artificial-intelligence-policy-and-pract.title: Artificial Intelligence, Policy, and Practice
artificial-intelligence-policy-and-pract.description: Artificial Intelligence, Policy, and Practice approach AI as a fundamentally socio-technical phenomenon, one that must be understood with both normative depth and technical precision.
